dict.acceptation: 鼻子；嗅觉；芳香，香气；突出的部分；
嗅出，闻出；用鼻子触；用鼻子品评（酒）等；探出；

sent.orig: Nose and elegant nose with attractive fruity, floral and citrus fruit aromas.
sent.trans: 芳香：优雅、馥郁、迷人的柑橘属水果的果香及花的清香。

sent.orig: Jack: Well, I just like his nose. I wish I had a Roman nose.
sent.trans: 我只是喜欢他的鼻子。我希望我有一个鹰钩鼻。

sent.orig: The nose is red brick, nose line.
He froze, nose to nose with his own scared-looking reflection in the dark glass.
sent.trans: 他面对着玻璃里自己可怕的脸，呆住了。

sent.orig: The END key provides nose-up trim, and the HOME key provides nose-down trim.
sent.trans: 结束键提供上仰修剪，并且回归键提供鼻子下来修剪。
